content: base is as wide as needed mark as rs near last st of round make a not of width of base as this will be needed for flap note as you add scs for body the piece will start to curl up if needed flip the piece so that the rs stitch marker is outside the piece … or fasten_off and provide a local faerie or your favorite house pixie with a sweet bed body for cell phone mp3 player or game system crochet in the round with single_crochet in each single_crochet around until body is long enough for the accessory to fit in comfortably with room to spare stop before the side of the cozy on the same side as the base stitch marker lay piece flat and mark st at each end for purse continue until body reaches the needed height stop before the side of the purse on the same side as the base stitch marker lay piece flat and mark st at each end for a cell phone or mp3 player if adding a strap continue placing a single_crochet in each single_crochet until you reach the st before the first marker slip_stitch in that st not in the one with the marker in it for a purse if adding a strap continue placing a single_crochet in each single_crochet until you reach the second st before the first marker slip_stitch in that st for all if skipping the strap continue placing single_crochet in each single_crochet until you reach the stitch marker remove marker and single_crochet in that st do not fasten_off and skip to flap section © 2008 catbird studios 2 accessory cozy or purse strap for cell phone or mp3 player chain 22 or more if longer strap is needed half_double_crochet in third chain from hook chain 1 skip 1 chain half_double_crochet in next chain buttonhole made half_double_crochet in each chain across join with single_crochet in single_crochet on other side of stitch marker on the back side of the cozy do not join in same st as marker if not making a flap slip_stitch in same single_crochet as marker and fasten_off skip to bead/button section and add side bead/button only for purse or game system decide how long strap needs to be and chain as many sts as needed for length attach with single_crochet to second st before marker on other side on front side of purse slip_stitch in next single_crochet before stitch marker single_crochet in same single_crochet as stitch marker half_double_crochet in first chain of strap and in each chain across at end of strap single_crochet in same single_crochet as stitch marker slip_stitch in single_crochet after stitch marker back side single_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in first half_double_crochet and in each half_double_crochet across at end of strap single_crochet in second single_crochet after stitch marker back side flap for cell phone or mp3 player continue placing single_crochet in each single_crochet on back side of cozy across to second st before marker do not single_crochet in st
